description: Ayase Takako is the class representative for Seiji`s class. She originally detested him, but after Seiji saves her from a gang, she begins to harbour a secret attraction to him. Unfortunately for her, all of her plans to confess her feelings to him fail, either through Seiji`s obliviousness or outside circumstances. Midori, however, recognizes Ayase`s attraction, and always makes covert attempts to sabotage any romance between the two.
name: Ayase Takako
